snippet.title: Grow Your Small Business Faster with Semrush
snippet.subtitle: For everything your small business needs to grow, there’s Semrush. Save time and money with an all-in-one marketing platform.

main.text: For everything your small business needs to grow, there’s Semrush. Save time and money with an all‑in‑one marketing platform.

tools.item-1_title: Help customers find your business online
tools.item-1_text: Get seen on Google, attract more customers, and get them to your site.
tools.item-2_text: Drive visits to your business —online and in-store.
tools.item-3_text: See what your competitors are doing online to create a unique strategy that puts you one step ahead.
tools.item-4_title: Be the talk of your town
tools.item-4_text: Access free social media tools<br class='br1200'>to get more people talking about your brand.
tools.item-5_text: Showcase your products, raise your brand visibility, and increase cash flow.
tools.item-6_text: Get tools that make it easy to set up and run effective ad campaigns.

help.title: Helping small businesses make a big impact
help.subtitle: Semrush’s platform helps business owners around the world grow to their full potential
help.text: Learn how Pastreez bakery used Semrush to rank #1 on Google and supercharge their growth

cta.title: Do big things with your small business
